name: Painball - KIT109 Exam Game
description:
Controls:

+) Z and / to control left and right flaps.

+)Press/hold space to launch ball from the launcher.

+)SPACE to boost the ball's speed in a pinch.

+) Left click to drag and drop the ball.

Due to my lack of programming skills, you cannot progress via dying through the level so please press Esc to open the title screen and select your desired level or click 1 to 9 to breeze through all of them. Each level has different puzzles and niches, however, some of them are too hard to implement due to my smol brain. I might update them later but no promise really :( Anyways, have fun my friends!

Oh and everything was made from scratch except for some scripts I got from tutorials.
